name: ADHD

screenshots.caption: Is that a Bad Guys location?

short_description:
The Active Defense Harbinger Distribution (ADHD) is a Linux distro based on Ubuntu LTS.  It comes with many tools aimed at active defense preinstalled and configured.  The purpose of this distribution is to aid defenders by giving them tools to "strike back" at the bad guys.

ADHD has tools whose functions range from interfering with the attackers' reconnaissance to compromising the attackers' systems.  Innocent bystanders will never notice anything out of the ordinary as the active defense mechanisms are triggered by malicious activity such as network scanning or connecting to restricted services.

If you have any questions, issues, or desire to contribute, please contact
ADHD@blackhillsinfosec.com
Or you may open a new ticket
https://sourceforge.net/p/adhd/tickets/

Check out the full training course offered at most SANS conferences or schedule a private event.
https://www.sans.org/course/active-defense-offensive-countermeasures-and-cyber-deception
summary: ADHD provides tools for active defense.
